_PAGE_FILTER_SEARCH_HIGHLIGHT_ARGUMENTS_: List of additional attributes in the format ['key="value"', 'key2="value2"']
Whether the search should be case-sensitive
A CSS class that should style the highlighted part of the value
The search term that should be highlighted in the value
The HTML tag to use instead of mark
The value in which the search term should be highlighted
_PAGE_FILTER_SEARCH_HIGHLIGHT_DESCRIPTIO: The function filterSearchHighlight is used to mark a search term in a value by enclosing the search term with HTML tags. It allows customization of the search term and the CSS class for highlighting.
